attributes.action: Penalise the producers of waste i.e. excessive packaging and reduce the tax burden on the consumer
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are always hearing of ways to offload the price of waste recycling onto the consumer - Its about time industry accepted more responsibility towards the way goods are over packaged.  Consumers do not have fair method to decide on the amount of waste packaging they collect.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
